titleStmt.title: Against Babylon and her merchants in England one groan more breathed forth from the grief of the spirit, for the sufferings of the saints ... / written by one that travels in spirit for Sions deliverance, John Anderdon.
titleStmt.author: Anderdon, John, 1624?-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
